text: Knightsbridge is a hamlet neighbouring Elmstone-Hardwicke and Uckington, close to Junction 10 of the M5 motorway, near Cheltenham in Gloucestershire, England. In addition to residential housing, Knightsbridge is home to a small business park. ==References== Category:Hamlets in Gloucestershire Category:Borough of Tewkesbury
title: Knightsbridge, Gloucestershire
